original_text: Now we pray to God that you will not do anything wrong—not so that people will see that we have stood the test but so that you will do what is right even though we may seem to have failed.
korean_text: 우리가 하나님께서 너희로 악을 조금도 행하지 않게 하시기를 구하노니 이는 우리가 옳은 자임을 나타내고자 함이 아니라 오직 우리는 버림 받은 자 같을지라도 너희는 선을 행하게 하고자 함이라

sentences.original_text: that you will not do anything wrong
not so that people will see
that we have stood the test
but so that you will do what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 너희가 올바른 것을 행하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: even though we may seem to have failed
